member.name: T:Accuweather.Indices.IIndices
member.summary: Get Indices information for a specific location.

member.name: M:Accuweather.Indices.IIndices.FiveDaysOfDailyIndexValuesByGroupIndex(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns 5 days of daily index data for a specific group of indices, by location key.
member.param: Unique ID to search for a specific location.
Boolean value specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

member.name: M:Accuweather.Indices.IIndices.FiveDaysOfDailyIndexValuesBySpecificIndex(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns 5 days of daily index data for a specific index, by location key.
member.param: Unique ID to search for a specific location.
Boolean value specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

member.name: M:Accuweather.Indices.IIndices.FiveDaysOfDailyIndexValues(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns 5 days of daily index data for all indices, by location key.
member.param: Unique ID to search for a specific location.
Boolean value specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.
